TEXT.S: Pakistan Itini i 30 00 N, 70 00 E, noAsiya ko Pakistan. Polong no sekalay i 796,095 sq km "saka 36 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 770,875 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 25,220 sq km " Polong i 201,995,540 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 35.20 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 2.10 , malo no roma to a sera 62.70 . siyoto O Islamabad ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakafalo 14 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Mamnoon Hussain, patirengan a romi'ad i 2013 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 9 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
